llm_text:
Why:
The model flagged this transaction primarily because payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP +3.098) strongly increased risk. dayofweek (value=6; SHAP +1.007) further increased the score, indicating the transaction occurred on the model’s highest-risk day. amount_received (value=15373.0; SHAP +0.967) and amount_paid (value=15373.0; SHAP +0.388) contributed additional upward pressure due to the transaction size. Conversely, from_bank (value=249118; SHAP −0.523) reduced the risk score and partially offset the increases.

Conclusion:
Based solely on the cited drivers, the ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) executed on dayofweek=6 with amount_received/amount_paid=15373.0 produced a net increase in the model’s risk score despite a mitigating from_bank effect. If model weightings reflect true risk, this transaction merits further review.
